channel.description: Every trading day, Numbers By Barron's breaks down the market's most important stories into three essential numbers.

item.title: Amazon Freezes Corporate Hiring
item.description:
Coinbase sees crypto transactions plummet. Block jumps on earnings, PayPal sinks. And Amazon pauses new hires.
$COIN, $PYPL, $SQ, $AMZN, $LYFT
Host: Jackson Cantrell.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Federal Reserve Announces Latest Rate Hike
item.description:
The Fed continues to tighten monetary policy in effort to combat inflation. What Ford’s October sales indicate about the broader car industry. Plus, Paramount’s earnings. Host: Jackson Cantrell.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: Here’s What Elon Musk Might Charge for Twitter Blue Checks.
item.description:
The Tesla CEO kicks off his first week as Twitter’s owner with sweeping changes. Airbnb gives disappointing fourth quarter guidance. And SoFi delivers a positive surprise for investors.
$TSLA, $TWTR, $ABNB, $SOFI

item.title: Halloween to Cost a Spooky $10.6 Billion This Year
item.description:
Americans are spending a frightening amount on Halloween this year. Natural gas demand is likely to peak in 2030, according to a new report. Plus, a look at the potential freight rail strike. Host: Jackson Cantrell.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.title: U.S. Economy Grows 2.6% in Third Quarter
item.description:
A surprising reading of gross domestic product growth. The average rate on a 30-year mortgage tops 7%. Plus, what a burrito can tell us about the economy. Host: Jackson Cantrell.

item.title: Earnings Season Heats Up with Big Tech
item.description:
Alphabet, Amazon, Apple, Intel, Microsoft, and Meta will report earnings this week. Plus, Adidas logs a miss. Plus, a likely interest rate hike in November from the Federal Reserve. Host: Zoe Szathmary.

item.title: Jobless Claims Fall to 214,000
item.description:
The pilot shortages plaguing the airline industry could take three years to fix. Jobless claims continue to dip. Plus, Walmart will continue its closing streak for Thanksgiving Day. Host: Zoe Szathmary.

item.title: Facebook Shares Reach 4-Year Low
item.description:
Meta’s stock drops to its lowest level in four years. Honda and LG Energy Solution will build a $3.5 billion battery plant in Ohio. And proposed rules for gig workers weigh down Uber and Lyft shares.
$META, $LYFT, $UBER, $DASH
Host: Jackson Cantrell.

item.title: Hopes of a Fed Pivot Keep Fooling Investors
item.description:
Five times in the past 12 months investors have expected the Federal Reserve to shift policy — only to be wrong. Plus a Boeing 737 MAX plane flies in China for the first time in years. And Casino stocks plummet on bad Chinese holiday travel numbers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

item.description:
